resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158756</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158756</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2080</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Software for assisting High School students in the Spacial perception of Geological structures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Software für die Unterstützung der High School 
Kursteilnehmer in der Spacial Vorstellung der geologischen Strukturen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Logiciel pour aider des étudiants de lycée dans
la perception de Spacial des structures géologiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Software para ajudar a estudantes da High School 
na percepção de Spacial de estruturas geological</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Software per aiutare gli allievi della High 
School nella percezione di Spacial delle strutture geologiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογισμικό για την ενίσχυση των σπουδαστών γυμνασίου 
στην αντίληψη Spacial για τις γεωλογικές δομές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Software para asistir a estudiantes de la High 
School secundaria en la opinión de Spacial de estructuras 
geológicas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This aper describes the use of software to assist students in spacial perception , which is a necessary skill in the study of geology.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">structural geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spacial perception</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses aper beschreibt den Gebrauch von Software,
Kursteilnehmer in der spacial Vorstellung zu unterstützen, die eine 
notwendige Fähigkeit in der Studie der Geologie ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet aper décrit l'utilisation du logiciel 
d'aider des étudiants dans la perception spacial, qui est une 
compétence nécessaire dans l'étude de la géologie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este aper descreve o uso do software ajudar a 
estudantes na percepção spacial, que é uma habilidade necessária 
no estudo da geologia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo aper descrive l'uso di software aiutare 
gli allievi nella percezione spacial, che è un'abilità necessaria 
nello studio sulla geologia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το aper περιγράφει τη χρήση του λογισμικού για
να βοηθήσει τους σπουδαστές στην spacial αντίληψη, η οποία 
είναι μια απαραίτητη ικανότητα στη μελέτη της γεωλογίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este aper describe el uso del software de asistir
a estudiantes en la opinión spacial, que es una habilidad necesaria 
en el estudio de la geología.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">strukturelle Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">spacial Vorstellung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie structurale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">perception spacial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia estrutural</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">percepção spacial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geologia strutturale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">percezione spacial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δομική γεωλογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">spacial αντίληψη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">geología estructural</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">opinión spacial</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0

n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education

            <date>
              <dateTime>2009-02-20</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2080</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

            <date>

            </date>
          </contribute>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>text</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="en">18</string>
            <string language="x-t-lre">18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>

            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The Department of Science Teaching, Weizmann Institute of Science</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

            <taxon>

          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <classification>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

            </source>

              <id>305</id>

                <string language="en">curriculum subject</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

    <identifier>
